edu.gordon.atm.physical
Class CardReader

java.lang.Object
  edu.gordon.atm.physical.CardReader

public class CardReader
extends Object

Manager for the ATM's card reader. In a real ATM, this would manage a physical device; in this edu.gordon.simulation, it uses classes in package edu.gordon.simulation to simulate the device.

Constructor Summary
CardReader(ATM atm)
          Constructor
 
Method Summary
 void ejectCard()
          Eject the card that is currently inside the reader.
 Card readCard()
          Read a card that has been partially inserted into the reader
 void retainCard()
          Retain the card that is currently inside the reader for action by the bank.

Method Detail

readCard

public Card readCard()
Read a card that has been partially inserted into the reader

Returns:
Card object representing information on the card if read successfully, null if not read successfully

Eject the card that is currently inside the reader.

retainCard

Retain the card that is currently inside the reader for action by the bank.
